SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER, T1_T4.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT T1.EMP_ID ,T1.EMP_NM ,T1.SSRG_NO ,T1.BLTO_DEPT_ID ,T2.DEPT_NM AS BLTO_DEPT_ID_NM ,T2.DEPT_FULLNAME ,T1.OFPS_CD ,T1.RECRT_CNTR_TYPE_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'OFPS_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.OFPS_CD ) AS OFPS_CD_NM ,T1.OFPS_YRVC_COUNT ,T1.RESO_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'RESO_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.RESO_CD ) AS RESO_CD_NM ,T1.COMP_ENCM_DATE ,T1.GRP_ENCM_DATE ,T1.RET_DATE ,T1.RECRT_DST_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'RECRT_DST_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.RECRT_DST_CD ) AS RECRT_DST_CD_NM ,T1.CNTR_START_DATE ,T1.CNTR_END_DATE ,T1.HDOC_STAT_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'HDOC_STAT_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.HDOC_STAT_CD ) AS HDOC_STAT_CD_NM , T1.LVAB_START_DATE , T1.LVAB_END_DATE , T4.COMP_TEL_NO , T4.MBPH_NO , T4.EML_ADRS FROM HMST300T T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TT2.DEPT_ID , TT2.DEPT_NM , TT2.HGRK_DEPT_ID , LTRIM (SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH (TT2.DEPT_ID, ' > '), ' > ') AS DEPT_FULLNAME FROM HMST100T TT2 START WITH TT2.HGRK_DEPT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR TT2.DEPT_ID=TT2.HGRK_DEPT_ID ) T2 ON T1.BLTO_DEPT_ID = T2.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMST010T T3 ON T1.EMP_ID = T3.EMP_ID AND CUST_ROLE_CLSF_CD = 'C' AND CUST_ROLE_DTL_CLSF_CD = 'C01' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CUST_ID, MAX(COMP_TEL_NO) AS COMP_TEL_NO, MAX(MBPH_NO) AS MBPH_NO, MAX(EML_ADRS) AS EML_ADRS FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN CNPL_DST_CD = 'A' THEN TEL_NO ELSE '' END COMP_TEL_NO ,CASE WHEN CNPL_DST_CD = 'B' THEN TEL_NO ELSE '' END MBPH_NO ,CASE WHEN CNPL_DST_CD = 'E' THEN EML_ADRS ELSE '' END EML_ADRS ,CUST_ID FROM CMST031T TT1 ) TT2 GROUP BY CUST_ID ) T4 ON T3.CUST_ID = T4.CUST_ID WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(T2.DEPT_FULLNAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{bltoDeptId}) || '%'
AND UPPER(T1.EMP_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{empNm}) || '%'
ORDER BY T2.DEPT_FULLNAME ASC, T1.OFPS_CD ASC, T1.EMP_NM ASC )T1_T4 ) WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1) + 1 AND #{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1) + #{pageSize}

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER, T1_T4.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT T1.EMP_ID ,T1.EMP_NM ,T1.SSRG_NO ,T1.BLTO_DEPT_ID ,T2.DEPT_NM AS BLTO_DEPT_ID_NM ,T2.DEPT_FULLNAME ,T1.OFPS_CD ,T1.RECRT_CNTR_TYPE_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'OFPS_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.OFPS_CD ) AS OFPS_CD_NM ,T1.OFPS_YRVC_COUNT ,T1.RESO_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'RESO_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.RESO_CD ) AS RESO_CD_NM ,T1.COMP_ENCM_DATE ,T1.GRP_ENCM_DATE ,T1.RET_DATE ,T1.RECRT_DST_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'RECRT_DST_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.RECRT_DST_CD ) AS RECRT_DST_CD_NM ,T1.CNTR_START_DATE ,T1.CNTR_END_DATE ,T1.HDOC_STAT_CD ,( SELECT TT2.COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T TT1 INNER JOIN ACOM010T TT2 ON TT1.COM_GRP_CD = TT2.COM_GRP_CD WHERE CLMN_NM = 'HDOC_STAT_CD' AND TT2.COM_CD = T1.HDOC_STAT_CD ) AS HDOC_STAT_CD_NM , T1.LVAB_START_DATE , T1.LVAB_END_DATE , T4.COMP_TEL_NO , T4.MBPH_NO , T4.EML_ADRS FROM HMST300T T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TT2.DEPT_ID , TT2.DEPT_NM , TT2.HGRK_DEPT_ID , LTRIM (SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH (TT2.DEPT_ID, ' > '), ' > ') AS DEPT_FULLNAME FROM HMST100T TT2 START WITH TT2.HGRK_DEPT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR TT2.DEPT_ID=TT2.HGRK_DEPT_ID ) T2 ON T1.BLTO_DEPT_ID = T2.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMST010T T3 ON T1.EMP_ID = T3.EMP_ID AND CUST_ROLE_CLSF_CD = 'C' AND CUST_ROLE_DTL_CLSF_CD = 'C01' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CUST_ID, MAX(COMP_TEL_NO) AS COMP_TEL_NO, MAX(MBPH_NO) AS MBPH_NO, MAX(EML_ADRS) AS EML_ADRS FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN CNPL_DST_CD = 'A' THEN TEL_NO ELSE '' END COMP_TEL_NO ,CASE WHEN CNPL_DST_CD = 'B' THEN TEL_NO ELSE '' END MBPH_NO ,CASE WHEN CNPL_DST_CD = 'E' THEN EML_ADRS ELSE '' END EML_ADRS ,CUST_ID FROM CMST031T TT1 ) TT2 GROUP BY CUST_ID ) T4 ON T3.CUST_ID = T4.CUST_ID WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(T2.DEPT_FULLNAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{bltoDeptId}) || '%'
AND UPPER(T1.EMP_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{empNm}) || '%'
ORDER BY T2.DEPT_FULLNAME ASC, T1.OFPS_CD ASC, T1.EMP_NM ASC )T1_T4
